name: URL Shortener Plugin For WordPress
author: ExactLinks

sections.faq:
Can I use Exact Links for all WordPress Sites ?

Sure , you can use the exact links plugin to any WordPress Website.

Is it possible for me to migrate existing short links into Exact Links ?

This feature is not available right now, But we are working on this issue. Very soon this feature will be available and you can migrate existing short links to exact links.

Can I use Exact Links with my WordPress Theme ?

Yes , You can use Exact Links with any WordPress theme.

Will my Exact Links stop working if my license expires?

Exact Links will work but you will not get updates on Exact Links Pro. We will suggest you to renew the yearly Exact Links Subscription or you can purchase our lifetime deal .

Do You offer refunds ?

Yes, we offer a 14 days refund policy for the pro version . If you are not happy with Exact Links please shoot us an email with your order number. We will refund your money in 14 days. No Worry, you still can use free version.

Is Exact Links GDPR Compliant ?

Yes , Exact Links comes with GDPR Complaint .

Will it be a performance issue for WordPress ?

No, this Plugin has no performance issue for WordPress.

How can I get support from the Exact Links Team ?

We are a team of people continuously working on this plugin . If you need any support please contact us using our support system and we will be happy to assist you .

Does Exact Links support all platform ?

No, Exact Links is mainly a URL shortener. Some platforms does’t allow url shorteners directly, So your account will be suspended. That’s why we will suggest before using this plugin, make sure URL shortener is allowed in your selected platform .

Can I use the Exact Links plugin to all ads platforms?

Some advertising platforms such as google ads don’t allow direct short link placement. So we will suggest before using Exact Links on any third party platform, make sure platforms allow URL shortener.

sections.description:
Exact Links Plugins helps you to make custom slug based short links with tracking.

What I Can Do With Exact Links

  • Create custom slug based short link Example: https//mydomain.com/short-link [Free]
  • Create custom subdomain based short link Example:https//go.mydomain.com/short-link [Free]
  • Create QR code along with a short link Transform your offline traffic to online.[Free]
  • UTM Parameter Forwarding along with short link [Free]
  • Download Details Click Analytics (PDF of in CSV format) Detailed Click Analytics [ Click, Unique Click, Conversion Rate, Sales Volume, Order Number, Click Analytics By Country, Device Operating System, Browser, Traffic Source, Specific Short Link Placement Pages, Product name, Sale quantity, Product Price ] [Pro]
  • Customize thumbnail image for your social post [Free]
  • Get email notification for your created short links if somehow your target or destination URL is not working or broken . [Free]
  • Never miss sales for 404 traffic. [Free]
  • One click migrations from other popular URL shortener plugins [Free]
  • Create eye catching call to action box with tracking (8 pre-designed Template) [Pro]
  • Create choice page with multiple choice options [ 2 pre designed Template ] also Analyze customer choice behavior by choice page analytics [Pro]
  • Split traffic to different landing pages based on priority settings [Pro]
  • WooCommerce A/B Testing [Pro]

Simple Short Links

Exact Links comes with a simple URL shortener feature. You can easily convert your long ugly URL to a custom beautiful URL. Exact Links short URL feature also tracks clicks and
conversion with detailed analytical reports.

Youtube Video Tutorials | Official Facebook Community | Exact Links Pro | Documentation

What Problem Simple Short URL Solves (Simple Short Links)

  • You can create beautiful and customized short URL from ugly URL
  • You can do affiliate links cloaking by using simple short link feature
  • You can understand each short URL link performance (Click, Unique Click, Conversion Rate, Sales Volume, Order Number, Click Analytics By Country, Device Operating System, Browser, Traffic Source, Specific Short Link Placement Pages, Product name, Sale quantity, Product Price)
  • QR Code
  • Custom subdomain short link
  • Custom social media thumbnail for your created short link
  • Get broken links email alert if any destination URL not works
  • 1 click migration from other URL shortener
  • UTM URL builder Template

Box Content (Generate Awesome Designed Box Content With Tracking)

Box Template feature comes with an automatic click and conversion tracking system With eye-catching box design. Using box template you can create an awesome look box design in a minute without any coding skill.

Youtube Video Tutorials | Official Facebook Community | Exact Links Pro | Documentation

What Problem Box Content URL Shortener Solves

  • Creating awesome look box design with a single click
  • Create awesome look call to action button with automatic click and conversion tracking
  • Box template Easy Insertion by WordPress shortcode and gutenberg block
  • Detailed analytics for each box content (Click, Unique Click, Conversion Rate, Sales Volume, Order Number, Click Analytics By Country, Device Operating System, Browser, Traffic Source, Specific Short Link Placement Pages, Product name, Sale quantity, Product Price)
  • 8 different box template design with call to action button
  • Get email notification if your destination affiliate link not works

Youtube Video Tutorials | Official Facebook Community | Exact Links Pro | Documentation

Choice Page (Track Choice Behaviour Of Your Traffic)

Choice page by exact links is a unique method by which you can give multiple choice options for your product or service to your customer. You also can track which option gets more clicks and sales .

Youtube Video Tutorials | Official Facebook Community | Exact Links Pro | Documentation

  • Beautiful choice page built in seconds
  • Give multiple choice option to your customer
  • 2 Different choice page design
  • Easy choice insertion to page by short code
  • Test traffic choice behavior
  • Clear Insight which Choice option is converting most
  • Get email notification if any choice page destination links do not work .

WordPress A/B Testing

Exact Links A/B split features automatically splits traffic to different landing pages based on your priority setting and also tracks the conversion rate for each landing page. This is how you will know which landing is converting into sales.

Youtube Video Tutorials | Official Facebook Community | Exact Links Pro | Documentation

  • A/B Split allows users to Split Traffic to different landing pages based on priority.
  • A/B Split allows WooCommerce user to do A/B test
  • A/B Split allows users to understand device type, device brand, device name, browser, OS for landing pages
  • Detailed click analytics (Click, Unique Click, Conversion Rate, Sales Volume, Order Number, Click Analytics By Country, Device Operating System, Browser, Traffic Source, Specific Short Link Placement Pages, Product name, Sale quantity, Product Price)

Global Setting

  • Cookie based system for tracking visitor activity across clicks. You also can set Cookie time.
  • You can set slug character length for your automated short links.
  • You can set default price currency icon for your box template
  • You can set default affiliate disclosure text for box content feature
  • You can set default 404 page redirection and never miss revenue for 404 traffic
  • You can set the email address in which you will get notification if any destination link broken
  • You can enable of disable custom subdomain feature

sections.reviews:
Excellent

By chrisortiz on October 11, 2023

Very usefull, please add location tracking!

Excellent Link Shortener

By MizzLove on August 16, 2023

I was using other link shortener until I found Exact Links. Luckily we can import our shortened links to Exact Links plugin so no manual work of creating our shortened links from scratch, such a time saving feature. For a Wordpress owner, this is a must have. Creating a short link within your Wordpress dashboard is a breeze, I can do it within less than a minute since the setup is simple. Love that Google Analytics integration and link cloaking as well. Thanks.

Fantastic tool!

By Sujit B (useraccount99) on August 15, 2023

Amazed by the tool with multiple uses. The migration feature is a gem! It can save so much time and money. Before I installed the plugin I saw the short video on YT and thought of giving it a try, it words seamlessly. Kudos to the people behind the tool. Best wishes and would love to more features!

It's Great

By Ranvir Mehta (ranvirmehta) on August 15, 2023

I've been searching for a while for a plugin that shortens links using my main website address right from my WordPress dashboard. I tried Exact Links and it's great – no need for subdomains and external sites to shorten links anymore!

Must have plugin for affiliates

By TU Karim (danfyn) on August 15, 2023

indeed a fantastic plugin, works pretty well, easy to use and straight forward.
a must have plugin for WordPress based affiliate website.

Awesome! Awesome!

By BL Samota (blsamota) on August 15, 2023

It's a handy URL shortener that has proven to be indispensable for conversion tracking and efficient A/B testing. This is a valuable tool that I highly recommend to everyone.

Awesome URL Shortener

By retireno on August 13, 2023

This plugin is really impressive and stands out from its competitors like Box Content and 1-Click migration because of its unique feature. It’s really refreshing to come across a plugin that offers something different and innovative in the market.

Promising new tool. Dev team very responsive

By josecar on August 13, 2023

The tool right now is a bit rough on the edges but don't let it confuse you because the functionality is pretty nice. The developer is very responsive and has already taken well note of the feedback that I shared so it seems this is going to become an awesome tool (UTM builder with templates coming on v3 as the developer confirmed. YAY!).

I tested the redirection response and it's inmediate, so really happy with that part.

Nice replacement for Pretty Links with extra functionality on the works. Keep the good job, guys!

Very promising

By suparanova on August 13, 2023

This plugin looks very promising. The UI is beautiful and so far it's been working great. Excited to start using the premium version.

Easy to use and it makes creating links inside wordpress much easier!

By elmapena on August 12, 2023

Exactlinks is very easy to use and does what it's supposed to do. So now, I don't have to go to another site just to shorten my links. It also has choice page and box content, and other features that are very important to digital marketers like split testing, etc.
